title: Only 2 hours left
author: VD
content_html:
To cast your vote on the fate of the Strib and it’s not looking good for the old Star and Sickle. Popular sentiment would appear to be running strongly against it. One wonders if the publisher has considered changing the logo. I’m sure it will work wonders for Detroit.

I don’t know about you, but now I am TERRIFIED of the ferocious 0-16 Lions. Especially if they pick a wide receiver with the first pick of the 2009 draft.
content_text:
To cast your vote on
the fate of the Strib
and it’s not looking good for the old Star and Sickle.  Popular sentiment would appear to be running strongly against it.  One wonders if the publisher has considered changing the logo.  I’m sure it will work wonders for Detroit.
I don’t know about you, but now I am TERRIFIED of the ferocious 0-16 Lions.  Especially if they pick a wide receiver with the first pick of the 2009 draft.
